activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#8430
activity.text:
Hi @aparnacoronasafe ,

I've reviewed the issue regarding the formatting of summaries in CARE. To better understand the problem, could you please provide a video or screenshots that illustrate the current formatting issues, particularly the lack of spacing at the header and footer, and the page breaks between sentences?

This will help ensure that the proposed solutions address the issues effectively.

Thanks!
